text: Anastasia is a 1997 American animated movie with music and songs. Don Bluth and Gary Goldman directed it. It starred Meg Ryan, John Cusack, Kelsey Grammer, Hank Azaria and Christopher Lloyd. ==Plot== The movie is about the Grand Duchess Anastasia Nikolaevna of Russia and the idea that she might have survived the murder of her family by the evil sorcerer Rasputin, with amnesia. (In reality, Anastasia was murdered with her family, after the Russian Revolution, on 17 July 1918, by the Bolshevik secret police.) ==Other websites== * * * * * * * * * Category:1997 animated movies Category:1997 fantasy movies Category:1997 musical movies Category:American animated movies Category:1990s American fantasy movies Category:1990s American musical movies Category:Annie Award winners Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Don Bluth Category:Movies about amnesia Category:Movies about princesses Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies set in Saint Petersburg Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Anastasia (1997 movie)
